name: statusbarerror
description: Show error and warning messages in the status bar, gutter or on the current line

statusbarerror.color.warning.description: Font color for the linter warnings in the statusbar

statusbarerror.color.error.description: Font color for the linter errors in the statusbar

statusbarerror.color.info.description: Font color for the linter information in the statusbar

statusbarerror.color.hint.description: Font color for the linter hints in the statusbar

statusbarerror.icon.warning.description: Unicode icon for linter warnings in the statusbar

statusbarerror.icon.error.description: Unicode icon for linter errors in the statusbar

statusbarerror.icon.info.description: Unicode icon for linter info in the statusbar

statusbarerror.icon.hint.description: Unicode icon for linter hints in the statusbar

statusbarerror.wholeLine.errorColor.description: Background color of the line when an error is found

statusbarerror.wholeLine.warningColor.description: Background color of the line when a warning is found

statusbarerror.wholeLine.errorFontColor.description: Font color of the error line message

statusbarerror.wholeLine.warningFontColo.description: Font color of the warning line message
